attributes.action: Stop Racism towards us English citizens?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is becoming stupid and english citizens are becoming few and far between we live in england yet its hard too walk out in public without being surrounded by people that aren't english. Yet we are the racist ones, why is it that if we are to tell the police a foreign citizen has racist towards us we are told its not racist as they are a minority, you may be right these foreign citizens may be a minority until you consider the number of illegal foreign citizens then it is surely us english citizens that are the minority. When will labour realise what it is doing to england and stop england from being invaded this is not racism this is just a simple fact that england should give english citizens priority are ancestors fought so hard to stop our country from being invaded in WW1 and WW2 yet now we just seem to be letting our country be invaded and slowly taken other.

rejection.details: Your petition represents a point of view, NOT a requested action from the Government. Please resubmit accordingly.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
